messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: High levels of fruit-based bluespace activity detected near station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to a bluespace instability, a large amount of corgi dogs have appeared on the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Due to a mis-print, we have sent a very valuable and secure ferry to you. Please ignore it and do not touch the biological destruction device.

We apologies for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a whoop of rodents have descended into the maintenance tunnels.
